about_the_game:
6 neighborhoods,
35 stickers missing,
1 helpless crush!

Before the Sunday is over, Lucas needs to gather stickers to complete an album he plans to gift his secret crush, Leo, so he can finally confess his feelings. Join him and Carol, his ironic best friend, as they explore different parts of a gorgeous watercolor city in six chapters, meeting weird-ass curious characters as you solve tons of fun logic, drawing and jigsaw puzzles in a heartfelt coming-of-age story!

After you finish the story mode, turn A SUNDAY AFTERNOON into a relaxing puzzle game, to the tunes of some amazing lo-fi music by Nicobé!
